name: Adult diapers
description: Frail senior needs diapers as he is unable to walk quickly to the toilet in time and often soils himself.

contact.org: Allkin Singapore's Active Ageing Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 469
contact.name: Kei Ng

name: Diapers
description:
Hi, there is a household of 6 who requires diapers for 2 of their young children. Husband is certified temporarily unfit for work as he is required to be the main caregiver for his wife and children. Wife was a victim of a scam which led to huge financial losses. With their lack of income and financial strain, they would require diaper support for the children. Here are the diaper details: Diapers Type 1
Brand: Merries
Size: XL
Type: Pants, 

Diapers Type 2
Brand: Merries 
Size: XXL 
Type: Pants

Thank you.

name: Diapers
description: Client is a full-time caregiver to her two young children. The family is living in a rental flat, with the husband being the sole breadwinner. Client will require assistance in getting diapers (Size M and XL - 2 packets each).

name: Oxygen Concentrator
description:
74-year-old elderly lady has late-stage cancer. She requires an oxygen concentrator to help with breathlessness. Family has financial difficulties and is unable to afford the cost of renting or buying one. Looking for a donor who has a secondhand one in good condition. 

Pls contact me at 97274215 via Whatsapp. Thank you.

passiton.name: Oxygen Concentrator Machine
passiton.description: Oxygen Concentrator machine with original manual and box.

name: Adult diapers
description:
Client is an elderly man with various medical health conditions preventing him from being able to manage activities such as going to the toilet without support from his son. 

As such, he is reliant on adult diapers and we would like to request for any amount of diapers possible to assist as the family is facing financial difficulties. Client is not particular with brand.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Muhammad Redha Bin Ahmad Razif

name: Adult diapers
description: An elderly woman is taking care of her husband, who has dementia and has suffered a mild stroke, leading to incontinence. As a result, he needs frequent diaper changes every day. Unfortunately, they are both unemployed and struggling financially. The woman is kindly asking for help in getting FairPrice XL-sized adult diapers pants, as the ongoing expense has become a significant burden for them.

contact.org: Fei Yue Community Services - Mental Health
contact.name: Chris Tan

name: Wheelchair
description: Client comes from a low-income family. He is an above-knee bilateral amputee and would require a 4-wheeler motorised Personal Mobility Aid (PMA) to travel around for his medical appointments and to seek employment.

passiton.name: WheelChair
passiton.description:
Wheelchair is older than 4 years old. is the heavier metal model. bought a replacement lighter model for my mom and thus have this as a spare sitting in the storeroom. 

item is still good condition with the basic function still working. (brakes, seats, footrest etc)

name: Bookshelf
description: Family of 5 with 3 school-going children. As client's husband recently changed job and client has not been successful in securing employment, financial belt has been tight for the family. They are looking to replace some items that have worn out. (HW)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Low Kim Yong
